title: Surprise Orgasms & Summer Sex Talks

description:
On today’s show, Emily is bringing you Summer highlights of sex in the news because what better way to welcome in the Fall season than reflecting on the hottest happenings of 2019? Plus, she’s answering all your sex, dating & relationship questions.

She talks about all the heat this summer brought us – from accidental orgasms, summer penis, to non consensual choking – & if it was actually hot or not, how video chat is only ideal for first dates but never for sexual compatibility, & ways to find the common ground of sexual experiences with a partner. 


Follow Emily on all social: @sexwithemily

For even more sex talk, tips, & tricks visit sexwithemily.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
